I'm not sure about JUnit 4.0 - JUnit Add On (
http://junit-addons.sourceforge.net/) contains assertNotEqual etc. As for
assertThrows - I've seen a few people ask for it but no open source
implementations (at least that google finds). Perhaps you would like to
contribute on to JUnit add on?

BTW is there any thought on porting JUnit add on to 4.0?

Mark
